name: Be Our Guests
description: This year's Convergence Day promises to be quite the happening affair after so many successful first and second contacts this year. Ensure the event goes off without a hitch and no potential first contacts end up on the plate!
rules:
-- Unique Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using C.O.P. Janeway, any version of Jurati, Data, Fontaine, or Artists will provide a bonus to Supply Missions.
-- Every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are only available during Phase 1. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Jurati, Data, Fontaine, C.O.P. Janeway, or Artists
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Supply Missions!

featured_crew.name: Sisko
featured_crew.flavor: With the Pah-Wraiths sealed away, The Sisko ascended to the Celestial Temple with The Prophets to continue his work outside time.

action.name: Only Time Will Tell

featured_crew.name: Data
featured_crew.flavor: In honor of Riker's and Deanna's “conjugation” Data took the stage and gave a performance that blew everybody away.

action.name: Oh, Blue Skies, Smiling at Meeee

featured_crew.name: Vic
featured_crew.flavor: A self-aware hologram, Vic runs the 'Vic's Las Vegas Lounge' holoprogram popular among the DS9 command staff.

action.name: The Best Is Yet To Come

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

action.name: The Best Is Yet To Come

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Sisko
rewards.flavor: With the Pah-Wraiths sealed away, The Sisko ascended to the Celestial Temple with The Prophets to continue his work outside time.

adventures.name: A Sweet Treat
adventures.description: Find the seventeen types of chocolate for a Ktarian puff.

adventures.name: Seasoned by the Sea
adventures.description: Locate Enaran algae for algae puffs.

adventures.name: Parthas a la Yuta
adventures.description: Gather parthas for a dish made in tribute.

adventures.name: You're Cordially Invited
adventures.description: Craft a menu for an unforgettable celebration.

rewards.name: Be Our Guests
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

rewards.name: Vic
rewards.flavor: A self-aware hologram, Vic runs the 'Vic's Las Vegas Lounge' holoprogram popular among the DS9 command staff.

action.name: The Best Is Yet To Come

rewards.name: Data
rewards.flavor: In honor of Riker's and Deanna's “conjugation” Data took the stage and gave a performance that blew everybody away.

action.name: Oh, Blue Skies, Smiling at Meeee

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

goals.flavor: Be the best host with the Bajorans.

potential_rewards.name: Bajoran Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Bajoran faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

goals.flavor: Celebrate another glorious year with the Klingon Empire!

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "Hey, Captain, good of you to join us. I was just schooling my fellow hosts here on what makes for a good party. Tasty eats, the right company, and a swingin' soundtrack!"
"By 'swinging', I assume you mean the genre of music and not merely oscillation itself. At any rate, I believe you are correct."

"As we will be using this Convergence Day party to deepen relations with some of our newest allies, it is especially prudent that we provide entertainment and a diverse menu suited to their tastes and health needs."

"You got the right idea, pally! But let me let you in on a lil' somethin': nobody wants that fake junk you all eat everyday. Get out there and find the real stuff to cook up. Some real herbs and spices."
"Well, you heard the man. Think you can help us spice things up with some authentic ingredients, Captain?"
